Render Core

Render Core is a cloud based rendering service found in Hollywood California, USA. It specializes in rendering projects for animation, architectural, broadcasting, industrial design, marketing, entertainment, and VFX purposes. It is unknown what online servers they use to render.

Engine Support

  • Maya
  • 3ds Max
  • Blender
  • C4D

A full list of supported engines can be found here

Features

  • Fully Automated
  • 24/7 on demand and reserved rendering
  • Free Trial
  • FTP file transfer for secure uploading

User Review Score

Render Core does not seem to have a large online presence. Based on the small number of user reviews that were found the verdict seems that using this service is a positive experience.

Pros

  • Cost estimator
  • 24/7 support
  • Flat rate rendering
  • Standard payment options

Cons

  • Low software support
  • Low plugin support
  • No documentation unless you purchase
  • Small internet presence
